page.title: 10Fox hounds
page.content: {The New Forest Fox hound kennels are between Lyndhurst and Cadnam. They have 60 hounds also 4 terriers and the oldest is called Badger and he is 11 years old.The youngest Terrier was called Daisy, The hounds have names too. One of them had 7 puppies and 1 of them had 4. The puppies drink milk from goats, the hounds are fed once a day. The dogs go hunting twice a week in the winter. Two men look after the hounds and 4 horses .When they go hunting the terriers go down the foxes' hole.{Mark {Read 8. The area was mostly filled {with with trees. The Forestry {Commission has planted lots of them. {Between the plantations were wide {gravel paths.About half of the trees {were deciduous and half conifers of {various ages.The forest was put into {enclosures by wire fences and gates.
